episodes.title: Let's Begin
episodes.plot: Miyagi-Do, Eagle Fang and Cobra Kai are training for the all valley karate tournament.

episodes.title: First Learn Stand
episodes.plot: Johnny picks up defensive strategies while Daniel learns to how to go on the offensive. Amanda confronts Tory. New kid Kenny is bullied at school.

episodes.title: Then Learn Fly
episodes.plot: Kenny tries to become a student of Cobra Kai with some encouragement from Robby, while Johnny urges Sam to take a leap of faith - in herself.

episodes.title: Bicephaly
episodes.plot: Kreese brings Terry back to Cobra Kai, but his former partner isn't interested in repeating history. Johnny grows envious of Daniel mentoring Miguel.

episodes.title: Match Point
episodes.plot: Johnny and Daniel's dojo and their fragile alliance teeter on the brink of collapse when they agree to a winner takes all sensei showdown.

episodes.title: Kicks Get Chicks
episodes.plot: A major change to the upcoming tournament sends Johnny scrambling to find a new recruit for Eagle Fang. Tory must ask a favor of the LaRussos.

episodes.title: Minefields
episodes.plot: Daniel invites Anthony to join Miyagi-Do and discovers he doesn't know his son as well as he thought. Miguel learns about Johnny and Carmen's relationship.

episodes.title: Party Time
episodes.plot: Miguel and Sam are excited about attending the junior prom until another couple unexpectedly shows up. Terry lures Johnny to a familiar location.

episodes.title: The Fall
episodes.plot: The annual All Valley Karate Tournament kicks off as several competing dojos vie for the grand championship - and settle some personal scores.

episodes.title: The Rise
episodes.plot: The tournaments comes to a shocking end, with the aftermath leaving its participants reeling - and two champions facing uncertain futures.
